time: Stirred for one hour after adding Hydroxymethylpyridine and NEt4OH
Stirred for a further hour after adding NaN(CN)2
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The mixture was gently stirred at room temperature for one hour, then solid NaN(CN)2 (89 mg, 1 mmol) was added. After the mixture had been stirred for a further hour, it was filtered, and the filtrate was carefully diffused in THF (40 mL) in a narrow glass tube (f = 6 mm) to form brown block crystals of 1.
